column3: I don't really like adding a separate column for this with just yes/no. I'd prefer a more compact way to signal these, like changing the color, adding an icon, .... (many other things possible)\n
Or, a very narrow column with just a checkbox or such would be acceptable to me too. But this one is much too wide.\n

I think it would be nice, to be able to sort and filter by watchonly. Updated now with an eye-icon and narrow column.

![watchonly_column5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/3881033/21292ea0-218a-11e4-8db5-6647d9754e2f.png)

![watchonly_column6](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/3881035/257ab4ce-218a-11e4-8587-23fbf3afaa39.png)

@cozz Looks very very nice :), great work here!\nAre there changes to the tooltip also? Does it read watch-only in it or ist there also that eye?\n
Tooltip says nothing new currently, as I removed the (w) completely. I may add this back in, and say watch-only in the tooltip.\n
